local_intent: Execute placement of the white plate onto the red plate using place_pose with a light press, verify contact, release gripper, and retreat.
assumptions: place_pose has been computed and is valid on the blackboard
red_plate is detectable from current pose
press_force=10 is appropriate for achieving contact without damage
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT place phase: perceive red plate, confirm place_pose, move above, align, place with press, verify contact, open gripper, and retreat.
